markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Rostland Partisan](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=62)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 34 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Broken Lands

</column>

You grew up among the southern houses of Brevoy in old Rostland. You’re accustomed to arguing from a position of underappreciated worth.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution
or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) skill, and the [Politics Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Group Impression](/Feats.aspx?ID=789) skill feat.
name: Rostland Partisan

summary_markdown: You grew up among the southern houses of Brevoy in old Rostland. You’re accustomed to arguing from a position of underappreciated worth.
text: Rostland Partisan Source World Guide pg. 34 2.0 Region Broken Lands You grew up among the southern houses of Brevoy in old Rostland. You’re accustomed to arguing from a position of underappreciated worth. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Diplomacy skill, and the Politics Lore skill. You gain the Group Impression skill feat.
